name: Prestige Battle Academia Qiyana
description: Some say class president and Sorcery Club captain Qiyana is Babylon Academy's greatest student (a rumor she gladly spread). When the God-Weapon instead chose Xayah to lead Babylon into the cross-academy tournament, Qiyana took it personally. Now she plots her revenge, and her opening move? Relationship sabotage.
